Summary: 2 white orbs flying around above Woodland Hills Ca suburbs. Criss-crossed each other after about 2 mins. and then disappeared.
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There was one other sighting in Los Angeles on or around April 7th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile walking through a friend's neighborhood we spotted 2 white orbs cruising around at what I estimate was maybe 2-3 thousand feet. The objects were first noticed by my fiance's sister and at first glance I assumed they were birds. I put my sunglasses on and looked again; at that point I realized there was no wing, tail, or identifying shape other than what I would call a "shiny orb". I kept staring as I expected my eyes to be playing tricks on me or for wings or some other markings to become visible but there were none. They flew in a rounded "zig-zag" path above the neighborhood for about 2 minutes. They criss-crossed each other's path after a short time and then seemed to just disappear. I was able to compare their shape, size, and color with birds and a passenger jet that flew by far off in the horizon. For a second I thought they could be balloons but there was absolutely no mistaking not only some kind of intelligent control but also a shape unlike any wildlife or human made object I have ever seen. I was with two others who also saw the same thing. It was a very thrilling experience. I have always believed in alien life but never expected to see any. There is just no way they could be anything other than UFO's. Amazing.
